title: How to Make a Watermelon Grapefruit Shooter

steps.headline: Place chunks of fresh watermelon into the food processor.

text: Making the Watermelon Puree Place chunks of fresh watermelon into the food processor. Do this in batches, adding more as needed and measuring the amount made as you go. Process until smooth. When it's well pureed, it should be good to use. Making the Gelatin Bring one half cup water to a boil.  Place the gelatin in a heatproof container with a spout.  Pour the water into the gelatin and stir to dissolve the gelatin completely.  Assembling the Shooters Pour the dissolved gelatin into the watermelon puree.  Divide the watermelon mixture and grapefruit juice among 12 shot glasses. Alternatively, pour into small juice glasses. Place in the refrigerator to chill. Chill until the shots are thick but not fully set. Serving Add a little grapefruit juice and/or tequila to finish off.  Serve immediately.
